Description: Unique identifier for the cost line item.
The date the usage occurred (daily granularity).
Specific service name (e.g., EC2, Compute Engine, S3).
Team owner tag/label (NULL indicates missing tag).
Final cost in USD after applying Savings Plan/RI benefits (The definitive cost to report).
Flag for poor data quality: TRUE if a critical tag is missing (initial issue is simulated).
